body_html: TensorFlow serving requires you to run ./configure from within the TensorFlow directory. It would be great if we could somehow depend on TF as a workspace target and configure it with some defaults, but I agree it's a different issue and this one is resolved (though may need to be cherrypicked into 1.0 as Robson mentioned).

It would be great if we could somehow depend on TF as a workspace target and configure it with some defaults, but I agree it's a different issue and this one is resolved (though may need to be cherrypicked into 1.0 as Robson mentioned).
body: TensorFlow serving requires you to run ./configure from within the TensorFlow directory. It would be great if we could somehow depend on TF as a workspace target and configure it with some defaults, but I agree it's a different issue and this one is resolved (though may need to be cherrypicked into 1.0 as Robson mentioned).
